quote: I was looked at, but I wasn't seen.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Perseverance is the key to overcoming obstacles.
author: Anonymous

quote: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Anonymous

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. They're not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
author: James A. Michener

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

author: Confucius

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. They're not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
author: James A. Michener

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I am convinced that about half of what separates successful entrepreneurs from non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Through perseverance, many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Perseverance is the mother of good luck.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H.G. Wells

quote: The secret to success is constancy to purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Perseverance is another word for faith.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
author: William James

quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates successful people from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
author: Richard Branson

quote: To reach a port, we must sail—sail, not tie at anchor—sail, not drift.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Perseverance is the courage to ignore the obvious wisdom of turning back.
author: Anonymous

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A river cuts through rock, not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
author: Jim Watkins

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Perseverance is an active principle, and cannot continue to operate but under the influence of desire.
author: William Godwin

quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves.
author: Marie Curie

quote: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
author: B.F. Skinner

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
author: LL Cool J

quote: The path from dreams to success does exist. May you have the vision to find it, the courage to get on to it, and the perseverance to follow it.
author: Kalpana Chawla

quote: Grit is sticking with your future, day in, day out, not just for the week, not just for the month, but for years.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Difficult things take a long time, impossible things a little longer.
author: André Meyer

quote: Never, never, never give up.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: History has demonstrated that the most notable winners usually encountered heartbreaking obstacles before they triumphed.
author: B.C. Forbes

quote: Perseverance is a virtue that cannot be understated.
author: Bob Riley

quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Just remember, you can do anything you set your mind to, but it takes action, perseverance, and facing your fears.
author: Gillian Anderson

quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The slope of difficulty would be easy to climb, if the goal were not so high.
author: Ovid

quote: Small drops of water, in time, can hollow out a stone.
author: Lucretius

quote: Slight not what's near through aiming at what's far.
author: Euripides

quote: We can do anything we want to do if we stick to it long enough.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Everything that I've ever been able to accomplish in my life and in my career has come from perseverance.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: It is better to take many small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.
author: Old Chinese Proverb

quote: Men fail much oftener from want of perseverance than from want of talent.
author: William Cobbett

quote: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: You only fail when you stop trying.
author: Unknown

quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: How long should you try? Until.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The difference between the difficult and the impossible is that the impossible takes a little longer.
author: George Santayana

quote: Don’t be discouraged. It’s often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
author: Unknown

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The 3 C's of life: choices, chances, and changes. You must make a choice to take a chance or your life will never change.
author: Unknown

quote: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time.
author: George M. Moore Jr.

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Press on. Nothing can take the place of persistence.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Work as if you were to live a hundred years. Pray as if you were to die tomorrow.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The most essential quality for a good team is that it can persevere when things go wrong.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
author: William Barclay

quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Perseverance is power.
author: Unknown

quote: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration.
author: Thomas A. Edison
